price: আৰু যাৰ আমলনামা পিছফালৰ পৰা দিয়া হ’ব,
arabic: وَأَمَّا مَنۡ أُوتِيَ كِتَٰبَهُۥ وَرَآءَ ظَهۡرِهِۦ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-ammā man ūtiya kitābahu warāa ẓahrihi
